OOC:  Actually, this storyline was my first story on this group and it
was posted on Mon Nov 4, 2002.  The prisoners have been loose since
day one, but my characters cleared the upper decks and got it flying
again.  My character Celeron who is now with the Bushido Predecons got
his start here. Since the reset (the start of NBW Age of Wars) the
ship has been orbiting earth and it is once again in very bad
condition.  The remaining crew has little memory of what happened.

It would be fine to put a character down there, but I have one or two
more post ideas i want to do before the prisoners become more active.
I think there was at least one other person who said they were
interested in joining this plot earlier.  Email or IM me if you have
any questions and I'll try to get this plot moving.

On 9/29/07, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
> Heya! I may have an idea for a prisoner by the name of Spectrum. How
> would I go about inserting him onboard ship? He could easilly be
> onboard in the lower sections and the power fluxuation have freed him,
> or what ever else suits your needs.
>
> Preston
